title: Help ID this font-Round Bauhaus style font with serifs
content:
Can't say I really like it, but a friend wants to use it...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110519025818/http:/typophile.com/files/image_1.jpg) | 97.88 KB |
author: cberg7

comments.content:
You know, we had a post with a different sample of this same font a few days ago. Unfortunately, I think that thread had a title like this one, and now I have no idea where to find it. Maybe someone else who sees this will remember it.

Please help the IDers by using a descriptive title that we might have a chance to find again. "Round Bauhaus style with serifs" would be a good title for this thread, and you could edit your post to change it, I think.

This font resembles a font called [Horatio](http://web.archive.org/web/20110519025818/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/horatio/), but with added serifs. I suspect it is new (possibly a freebie).

- Mike Yanega
Thanks for the advice! Never posted before... Changed the post title to make it more descriptive! :-)

Thanks. Welcome to the forum. Now, maybe someone will remember the previous thread, because I don't recall ever seeing an answer to it.

- Mike Yanega
